title: Fix Progress Metric Logic
description: The analysis from 2025-11-12 revealed that the project progress metric is misleading. This task is to refactor 'dashboard/dashboard_generator.py' to calculate progress based on a reliable source, such as the number of completed vs. open work items, instead of file existence.
acceptance_criteria: The 'dashboard_generator.py' script is refactored to use a reliable data source for progress calculation.
The dashboard accurately reflects the true state of project progress.
The '100% complete but planned' anomaly is resolved.
notes: A reliable dashboard is crucial for accurate project management and decision-making.
